Changes.LogName: Alex PE and Healthy Eating Lesson

Entries.31032023/w sunny/t 900 1900/A ItTakesAVi: jaunty/-1000 -1000/farmer 93 26 3 Alex 87 22 2 Vincent 86 24 0 Jas 88 24 0 Penny 83 23 1/viewport 87 27 true/addConversationTopic ItTakesAVillage_AlexPE {{MinimumDaysBetweenLessons}}/{{SkippableToken}}/move farmer -3 0 0 true/emote Alex 32/emote Vincent 56/faceDirection Jas 2/faceDirection Vincent 2/speak Alex "Hi there @! Join our class!"/move farmer -3 0 0/faceDirection Vincent 0/faceDirection Jas 0/pause 500/speak Alex "Ok, first up: who knows what are some healthy foods?"/emote Vincent 40/speak Vincent "Does mayonnaise count?$3"/emote Alex 28/speak Alex "What? No bud, unfortunately it doesn't.$7"/emote Jas 32/shake Jas 500/speak Vincent "Don't laugh at me Jas! Mr. Alex, please do something!$s"/speak Alex "*ahem* Jas? Maybe apologize to Vincent?$9"/quickQuestion #Yes, that wasn't very nice, Jas.#(Say nothing)#It's Vincent's fault for saying something silly.(break)friendship Alex 50\friendship Penny 50\friendship Vincent 50\speak Alex "Even @ agrees with me, Jas."\speak Jas "... I'm sorry Vincent.$3"\speak Vincent "*sniff*$s"(break)\speak Jas "... I'm sorry Vincent.$3"\speak Vincent "*sniff*$s"(break)friendship Alex -50\friendship Penny -50\friendship Vincent -50\faceDirection Vincent 2\faceDirection Vincent 0\emote Penny 28 true\emote Alex 12\speak Alex "That's not helpful, @.$a#$b#Jas?$9"\speak Jas "... I'm sorry Vincent.$3"\speak Vincent "*sniff*$s"/pause 500/speak Alex "Alright then. Jas, what are some healthy foods you know?"/speak Jas "Fruits and vegetables, like apples and cauliflower!$4"/speak Alex "Yes, good choices."/emote Jas 32/speak Alex "We can't forget about protein though. Lentils are high in protein-"/jump Vincent 5/speak Vincent "What?! First no mayonnaise, now lentils?!$s"/emote Alex 28 true/emote farmer 28/speak Alex "You know what bud, meat is also high in protein. My favorite is salmon. That's some good eating."/speak Vincent "Oh. Mom makes bass for dinner sometimes. It's ok.$3"/emote Alex 32/speak Alex "See? That's good!#$b#To stay healthy you want to have fruits and vegetables like Jas mentioned, and protein as well.#$b#But! Healthy living wouldn't be complete without some exercise. Being active helps improve your mood and reduces the chances you'll get sick."/speak Jas "Oh... You don't mean push ups and sit ups, do you?$3"/speak Vincent "I hope not, that sounds boring.$3"/speak Alex "Actually that brings up an excellent point, Vincent!"/emote Vincent 16/speak Alex "Any good habit is hard to build, right? Like making your bed every day.#$b#With exercise, you want to find something you like to do and will want to keep doing.#$b#If you don't, it becomes a chore and you lose motivation to keep exercising."/pause 500/speak Alex "So, what do you like to do that involves moving around?"/emote Jas 40 true/emote Vincent 40/speak Jas "I like to jump rope."/speak Vincent "Um... I guess I like running."/speak Alex "Nice! Let's have Jas jump some rope, Vincent you can run, and I'll throw this ball around a bit!$h"/pause 500/emote Penny 32 true/animate Alex false true 75 23 23 23 23 23 16 16 16 17 18 19 19 20 21 22 23 23 23 23 23 23 23 23 23 23 23 23 23 23 23/animate Jas false true 200 16 17 18 19/speed Vincent 5/advancedMove Vincent true 0 -3 3 0 0 3 -3 0/pause 700/end

Entries.31032024/t 1200 1800/A ItTakesAVillage_B: Saloon1/-1000 -1000/farmer -1000 -1000 0 Gus 14 18 2 Penny 20 18 2 Jas 13 18 2 Vincent 15 18 2/showFrame Penny 34/viewport 14 21 true/addConversationTopic ItTakesAVillage_GusCooking {{MinimumDaysBetweenLessons}}/{{SkippableToken}}/pause 500/speak Gus "Hello young'uns! Are you ready to do some cooking?"/shake Jas 400/jump Vincent 4/speak Gus "Today will be light, since I realized it would be too dangerous to introduce you to the stove!#$b#We will make a nice and healthy salad!$h"/speak Gus "I'll make it first, and then you'll try!"/emote Jas 28/faceDirection Gus 3/playSound throwDownITem/addObject 12 18 20 1/pause 200/faceDirection Gus 1/playSound throwDownITem/addObject 16 18 22 1/addObject 17 18 419 1/pause 200/faceDirection Gus 2/playSound throwDownITem/addObject 14 18 193 1/pause 300/speak Gus "We've got our ingredients here. While the recipe calls for a specific quantity of each ingredient, cooking is more than just following a recipe.#$b#Once you know the basics, you can add or change ingredients, to get a different mix of flavors. That way, you're putting your own spin on the dish.#$b#Think about what your special ingredient or quantity might be."/speak Jas "... That's ok, I just want to stick to the recipe.$3"/speak Gus "Don't mind me, adding my secret dressing blend..."/playSound Milking/removeSprite 14 18/addObject 14 18 196 1/pause 2600/playSound getNewSpecialItem/pause 500/speak Gus "Ok, now it's your turn!"/speak Vincent "Yay!"/faceDirection Jas 1/pause 300/faceDirection Jas 2/speak Vincent "I want to try adding more leeks to mine!$h"/emote Gus 32/speak Gus "Ok, Jas, could you pass the leeks?"/emote Jas 40/pause 600/faceDirection Gus 3/speak Gus "Jas?"/stopMusic/pause 500/speak Jas "How big should the leek pieces be?$3#$b#What if I don't put enough dandelions and it doesn't turn out good?$3#$b#Will Mr. Gus be upset if I do it wrong and waste all his ingredients?$s"/shake Jas 400/emote Penny 16 true/jump Gus 3/speak Gus "Oh, Jas, it's ok! There is no pressure here. Take it one step at a time if you're feeling overwhelmed, alright?"/pause 500/speak Jas "*sniff* Yes, Mr. Gus.$s"/fade/viewport -100 -100/pause 800/warp Jas 13 17/warp Gus 14 17/warp Vincent 15 17/removeTemporarySprites/addObject 14 18 196 1/addObject 13 18 196 1/addObject 15 18 196 1/faceDirection Gus 2/viewport 14 21 true/pause 1000/playMusic Saloon1/playSound getNewSpecialItem/speak Gus "Well, will you look at that! We all made our own unique salads!$h"/emote Jas 60 true/emote Vincent 56 true/emote Penny 32/speak Penny "Say thank you to Gus, now."/faceDirection Vincent 3/speak Vincent "Thanks Mr. Gus! I didn't think cooking would be this fun!"/faceDirection Gus 1/emote Gus 32/faceDirection Jas 1/faceDirection Gus 3/speak Jas "... Thank you Mr. Gus. I'm sorry I got upset.$3"/speak Gus "You're welcome, kids. It's ok to feel stressed."/pause 500/faceDirection Gus 2/speak Gus "With more experience, I'm sure you'll both make great meals while keeping your cool!$h"/pause 500/end

Entries.31032026/w sunny/t 900 1900/A ItTakesAVi: 50s/-1000 -1000/farmer 81 94 0 Penny 89 94 2 Jas 89 95 0 Vincent 90 95 0/viewport 87 93 true/addConversationTopic ItTakesAVillage_HaleyLeahArt {{MinimumDaysBetweenLessons}}/{{SkippableToken}}/emote Jas 32/jump Vincent 4/pause 500/speed Jas 4/move Jas 0 4 1 true/speed Vincent 4/move Vincent 0 4 3 true/move Penny -2 0 3/faceDirection Penny 2/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 200/emote Penny 28/emote farmer 8/move farmer 2 0 1 true/pause 100/faceDirection Penny 3/pause 300/speak Penny "{{i18n:events-31032022.01}}"/question null "#{{i18n:events-31032022.02}}#{{i18n:events-31032022.03}}"/splitSpeak Penny "{{i18n:events-31032022.04}}~{{i18n:events-31032022.05}}"/speak Penny "{{i18n:events-31032022.06}}"/pause 300/emote Penny 40/speak Penny "{{i18n:events-31032022.07}}"/quickQuestion #{{i18n:events-31032022.08}}#{{i18n:events-31032022.09}}(break)friendship Penny 100\speak Penny "{{i18n:events-31032022.10}}"(break)friendship Penny -100\speak Penny "{{i18n:events-31032022.11}}"/pause 500/speak Penny "{{i18n:events-31032022.12}}"/emote Penny 56/speed Penny 4/move Penny 0 1 3/speed Penny 4/move Penny -9 0 3 true/move farmer -2 0 0 true/pause 500/end

Entries.31032025/A ItTakesAVillage_Beginning/A I: Secret Gnomes/-1000 -1000/farmer -1000 -1000 0 Penny 17 12 0 Elliott 18 9 2 Vincent 16 11 0 Jas 19 11 0/viewport 18 13 true/addConversationTopic ItTakesAVillage_ElliottStories {{MinimumDaysBetweenLessons}}/{{SkippableToken}}/speak Elliott "Hello everyone! Today we'll start with reading a short story, and then you'll work on a little exercise.#$b#I've provided a copy of the story so you can follow along to my illustrious narration. Please, sit."/showFrame Elliott 34/move Penny 1 0 2 true/move Jas 0 -1 3 true/move Vincent 0 -1 1 false/showFrame Penny 18/showFrame Jas 22/showFrame Vincent 24/pause 300/speak Elliott "There once was a band of misfits: Nuru the quick and cunning bard, Makena the strong and bold warrior, and Amari the steady and wise mage.#$b#They were thrust together by happenstance, united only by a common goal: to find the treasure of the great Ashanti..."/emote Jas 16 true/emote Vincent 16 true/emote Penny 8/fade/viewport -100 -100/pause 800/viewport 18 12 true/pause 1000/speak Elliott "Standing in the empty tomb, they looked at each other and realized that the real treasure was the friends they made along the way.$h#$b#The end.$h"/emote Vincent 20 true/emote Jas 32/pause 500/speak Elliott "What did you each like about the story?"/emote Jas 40 true/emote Vincent 40/speak Jas "Hmm... I really liked learning the new words in the story, through synonyms."/speak Vincent "I was surprised there were no treasure chests at the end. I liked the friendship between Makena, Nuru, and Amari!"/speak Elliott "Excellent findings, both of you!$h#$b#Now, let's have you write your own short stories.#$b#Jas, you can focus on using synonyms for vivid diction. Vincent, you can focus on creating a situation with a surprising end."/pause 500/fade/viewport -100 -100/stopMusic/pause 800/viewport 18 12 true/playMusic playful/pause 1000/speak Jas "... Plans foiled for the final time, Pax fumed in the wagon, heading for prison down the windy road.$4"/emote Vincent 20 true/emote Penny 32/speak Elliott "That was absolutely brilliant, Jas! I could picture all of it in my mind!$h"/emote Jas 56/speak Elliott "Now it's Vincent's turn!"/jump Vincent 5/fade/viewport -100 -100/pause 200/viewport 18 12 true/pause 1000/speak Vincent "The cracks in the ground finally split open into a big hole, and the heroes were trapped!#$b#They were never heard from again...$3"/jump Elliott 5/emote Jas 16 true/emote Penny 16/speak Elliott "The horror!$8#$b#Well done, Vincent! You surprised me, but you planted the seeds of the outcome well with the cracks.$h"/emote Vincent 56/speak Penny "Thanks for all the positive feedback, Elliott! I think you've really inspired the kids.$h"/emote Elliott 20/pause 500/end
